intro: Tuberolabium celebicum, commonly known as the Celebes tuber-labium, is a rare flowering plant native to the Indonesian island of Sulawesi. It belongs to the family Orchidaceae, commonly known as the orchid family, and is characterized by its unique tuberous root system. The plant produces striking, showy flowers with a distinctive labellum, which is a specialized petal structure. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in montane rainforests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, Tuberolabium celebicum is considered a vulnerable species.
